organizations: Pleasant Valley in Eastern Pennsylvania Conference
title: Brown scores twice, Spartans win 3-2
text: Boys Soccer Moravian 5, Notre Dame ES 1 BETHLEHEM - Brant Weirich scored but Notre Dame ES fell 5-1 to Moravian Academy in non-conference boys soccer Thursday. Moravian 5, Notre Dame ES 1 Notre Dame ES 0 1 - 1 Moravian 2 3 - 5 Goals - NDES, Brant Weirich. M, Phil Astolfi 2, Jack Painter, Frank Clark, Michael Gibson. Assists - M, Nic Lozano 2, M. Gibson, Ryan Brands, Phil Astolfi. Shots - NDES 9, M 30. Saves - NDES Jack Riordan 20, M Peyton Joseph and Tucker Eighmy 9. Stroudsburg 1, Pleasant Valley 0 STROUDSBURG - Matt McDermott assisted on John Burns' goal for Stroudsburg in a 1-0 win over Pleasant Valley in Eastern Pennsylvania Conference boys soccer Wednesday. Stroudsburg 1, Pleasant Valley 0 Pleasant Valley 0 0 - 0 Stroudsburg 1 0 - 1 Goals - S, John Burns. Assists - S, Matt McDermott. Shots - PV 5, S 9. Corners - PV 3, S 2. Saves - PV Brickman 8, S Cibischino 4. Records: Stroudsburg 12-5, Pleasant Valley 9-6-2. ES South 1, ES North 0 EAST STROUDSBURG - Darryl Longdon scored on a penalty kick to give ES South a 1-0 win over ES North on Wednesday in EPC boys soccer. ES South 1, ES North 0 ES North 0 0 - 0 ES South 0 1 - 1 Goals - ESS, Darryl Longdon. Shots - ESN 8, ESS 13. Corners - ESN 2, ESS 7. Saves - ESN Tommy Dunleavy 13, ESS Oscar Montes 8. Records: ES South 4-13-1 (3-12-1 EPC), ES North 0-18 (0-16 EPC). Men's Basketball ESU listed among DII Poll “Others to Watch” EAST STROUDSBURG - East Stroudsburg University is listed among “Others to Watch” in the Division II Bulletin men’s basketball preseason top 25 poll, it was released this month. ESU, 19-10 during the 2014-15 season, graduated its All-America backcourt of Whis Grant and Matt Tobin but returns two of its top three scorers in senior guard Jamal Nwaniemeka (12.7 ppg) and junior forward Rasheed Moore (12.6 ppg, 6.3 rpg), who has been named to the All-PSAC East second team in both of his first two seasons. Three returning Warriors have scored at least 750 career points in Moore (801 in 2 years), Nwaniemeka (759 in 2 years after transferring from Rider) and redshirt senior guard Will Brown (751), who returns for a sixth-year medical redshirt after missing the 2012 and 2013 seasons due to injury. Women’s Tennis USciences 7, ESU 2 STROUDSBURG - Freshman Morgan Buchter won a third-set tiebreaker at No. 4 singles and junior Kayla Loar won 6-4, 6-4 at No. 5 singles, but East Stroudsburg University fell to USciences, 7-2, in non-conference women's tennis on Thursday at Stroudsburg High School. The Warriors finished their fall schedule and will return to action with their PSAC East schedule in the spring. Today's Sports ES North at ES South, 4:45 p.m. PM East at PM West, 5:30 p.m. Pleasant Valley at Stroudsburg, 5:30 p.m. FIELD HOCKEY Pleasant Valley at PM East, 3:30 p.m. FOOTBALL Stroudsburg at Allen, 7 p.m. ES North at Nazareth, 7 p.m. ES South at PM West, 7 p.m. Dieruff at Pleasant Valley, 7 p.m. BOYS SOCCER Notre Dame ES at MMI, 4 p.m. CROSS COUNTRY PM East at Bethlehem Catholic, 3 p.m. poconorecord.com
